item.title: Postdoctoral position in quantitative/statistical/population genetics, bioinformatics
item.description: Working Title Post-Doctoral Research Associate Department Agronomy & Horticulture-0827 Requisition Number F_190182 Posting Open Date 09/30/2019 Application Review Date: (To ensure consideration, please submit all application materials before review date) 10/31/2019 Posting Close Date Open Until Filled Yes Description of Work The Post-Doctoral Research Associate will contribute to the integrated research land-grant mission of the home unit and the IANR, as an effective scholar and citizen, including supporting student recruitment and IANR science literacy.
